name: Do you really have what it takes to escape the race?
description: This tour will begin with us starting of at Escape the room Houston, which you will use puzzles and clues to make your way out of a maze, and then we will be heading closer to the water, enjoying the Kemah Boardwalk, at the Kemah Boardwalk we will tour the area and take a cruise around the Clearlake area. Enjoying the water and main attractions, we will be ending the tour with dining at one of the restaurants on the Kemah Boardwalk called the Lighthouse Buffet, it offers all you can eat food after all the adventures we would of had that day, it will be well needed. Enjoy!
